summary: **King Kong (2005):** In 1933, a filmmaker takes his crew to a mysterious island, where they find a giant gorilla named Kong and other prehistoric creatures. They capture Kong and bring him to New York. The film is a remake of the 1933 classic, directed by Peter Jackson. It stars Naomi Watts, Jack Black, and Adrien Brody. With a budget of $207 million, it was one of the most expensive films ever made. It received positive reviews and won three Academy Awards for its effects and sound.
title: King Kong (2005 film)
